title: Dawnbringer Icon and border not showing after forging
body: I've forged this Icon/Border pack in Loot 3 days ago and it still didn't show on my profile. Also "Forge" button didn't change to "Owned" like for my friends.

replies.body: I looked into this for you, and it looks like Dawnbringer Riven icon is already on your account.  You should see it in your icon inventory.  Let me know if that helps.

Nope, still nothing. I've checked every row in my icons. And also my friends that forged this pack have "Owned" below it and my still says "Forge"
Here have some screenshots: http://imgur.com/a/zPXFK
Thanks!  I've removed the icon from your account and re-added it manually.  Let me know if that worked for you!

Thanks a lot for helping, but it didn't work  :/ ... Still no icon and as I said in 1st post - border is missing too: http://i.imgur.com/6g5E9lK.jpg . This is how it looks for my brother (mine still says "Forge" and I can click on it): http://i.imgur.com/aBPLErW.png

Thanks for the info, though it's really strange it's still happening.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look and figure this out with you.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
Hi, I have the same issue. Could you help me please?
We'd like to look into this with you!  Submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look and see what's going on.  Hang tight!
